title: Question about bans.
body: I was banned once for 2 weeks so does that mean I have one warning left? I heard that you get 2 two week bans before a permanent ban.

replies.body: Per the [Instant Feedback System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) guide, a 2 week ban is one step away from a permanent suspension- regardless of the severity of the occurrence.  It's super important to play without causing others a negative experience, and consistently doing this can bring you back down that ladder over time.
